items.label: Video Conferencing Setup (Zoom, Teams, Webex, etc.)

connecting-calendars-video-apps/exchange.title: Exchange or Outlook Integration
connecting-calendars-video-apps/exchange.description: If you use an on-premise Microsoft Exchange server or Outlook desktop, you can connect it to OnceHub via Exchange Web Services (EWS).

connecting-calendars-video-apps/google-c.title: Google Calendar Integration
connecting-calendars-video-apps/google-c.description: Connect your Google Calendar to sync availability, manage events, and auto-block busy times.

connecting-calendars-video-apps/icloud.title: iCloud Integration
connecting-calendars-video-apps/icloud.description: Using iCloud for your personal or professional calendar? OnceHub lets you connect and sync your availability.

connecting-calendars-video-apps/o365.title: Microsoft Office 365 Integration
connecting-calendars-video-apps/o365.description: If you’re using Outlook via Office 365, you can sync your calendar with OnceHub to streamline scheduling.

connecting-calendars-video-apps/overview.title: Overview: Connecting Calendars & Video Apps
connecting-calendars-video-apps/overview.description: OnceHub integrates with your calendar and video conferencing tools to automate bookings, avoid conflicts, and generate meeting links automatically.

connecting-calendars-video-apps/video-se.title: Video Conferencing Setup (Zoom, Teams, Webex, etc.)
connecting-calendars-video-apps/video-se.description: OnceHub supports direct integrations with popular video conferencing platforms.

getting-started/Content-and-visual-guide.title: Signing Up & Account Creation
getting-started/Content-and-visual-guide.description: Getting started with OnceHub begins with creating your free account.

getting-started/create-a-shared-mailbox.title: Joining Your Organization’s Account
getting-started/create-a-shared-mailbox.description: If your team or company already uses OnceHub, you can join their organization to collaborate efficiently.

getting-started/field-library.title: Field Library Overview
getting-started/field-library.description: The Field Library in OnceHub helps you create and manage reusable fields across booking forms, chatbots, and routing forms.

getting-started/introduction-to-oncehub.title: Introduction to OnceHub
getting-started/introduction-to-oncehub.description: OnceHub is a scheduling automation platform that helps individuals and teams manage their availability, automate bookings, and connect with leads or customers effortlessly.

getting-started/mobile-app-sms-notificat.title: Mobile App & SMS Notifications
getting-started/mobile-app-sms-notificat.description: While OnceHub doesn't offer a dedicated mobile app, it's fully optimized for mobile browsers.
